title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.1 - Assemblages, parades or demonstrations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.1 - Assemblages, parades or demonstrations

State Regulations

No assemblages, parades or demonstrations of any kind shall
be held in or upon any of the buildings or the vehicular crossing without
written permission from the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
606.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
